gobblin.runtime.app

Interface ApplicationLauncher

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CliLocalJobLauncher, CliMRJobLauncher, SchedulerDaemon, ServiceBasedAppLauncher

    @Alpha
public interface ApplicationLauncher
extends Closeable
    Launches a Gobblin application. An application may launch one or multiple jobs via a JobLauncher. An ApplicationLauncher is only responsible for starting and stopping one application. Typically, only one application per JVM will be launched.

    An application can be started via the start() method and then stopped via the stop() method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void start()
      Start a Gobblin application.
      void stop()
      Stop the Gobblin application.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

        Start a Gobblin application.
        Throws:

      • stop

   throws ApplicationException
        Stop the Gobblin application.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if there is any problem starting the application
